title: Why Smite in Lane is better then Ignite
body: At 1st I was like yea smite{{summoner:11}}  shouldn't be in lane, but then I tried it with heimer{{champion:74}}  and chilling smite{{item:1402}} , was nice! Super leashed for jungler and my allies got to lane faster which created a positive morale atmosphere to start off the match in solo ranked. Smite in lane helped secured cannon minions or skuttle crab; then later it helped secure Dragons, Heralds, or Barons while the jungler busy or dead. The burst was the best cause it didn't give the enemy a chance to potions, stopwatch, or barrier to live. Great for burst mages for sure, the slow acted like an early Rylai's in lane and since it was a cheaper version of luden's it helped clear lane minions faster. Smite in lane felt like a superior spell in alot ways and aspects over ignite.{{summoner:14}}
